website_summaries.verdict: A user-friendly spin mop system that is a good choice for small to mid-sized cleaning chores.
pros: Bucket's spin system does a good job cutting down on excess water and the need to touch the mop head thanks to the foot pedal operation
cons: Owners of older versions gripe that the components aren't as well-made, including the mop handle that has been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart really quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product is used once every two weeks and has consistently fallen apart on me. Need to contact seller and get replacement, or just go back to another brand of mops, especially for the coast of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had one when they first cam out and it was wonderful. This product however is not. The mop head and stick don’t line up correctly when you go to spin it. I would have return it But the box was trashed before I realized this problem. I am going to contact Amazon and see if they will except back with out the original box or if they are willing to give me back a credit for it. I do not recommend this product.
